channel.title: -web banner request-
channel.description:
Ya, Need a web banner for my new site :P Guthrix.com Its gonna have lots of stuff. I dont need anything big just something perty. thx in advance. :)
P.s. the reason i cant do it is im bad at web graphics :(
ok dimensions, an average web banner? not sure how big, im more HTML than web graphics :(
The title, guthrix.com needs to be sharper than the rest like the back is gonna be blured out. Could i have the letters like old style with the points comming down at the end of the letter?
the background should be like lava :) or a plain. If its lava could you make the letters like rising out of the "magma"? if not thats ok. but if you do make the letters rise out of "magma" could it have little spots of magma rolling down the letters.

item.title: -web banner request-
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

Can you at least put it in the format required?

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Then we can see what kind of banner you want.

Read full topic
